StackNameOrId.description: (Required) Name or Unique ID of the CloudFormation stack to be deleted

Approvers.description: (Required) IAM user or user arn of approvers for the automation action

SNSTopicArn.description: (Required) The SNS topic ARN used to send pending approval notification for delete CloudFormation Stack. The SNS topic name must start with Automation.

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Optional) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.

inputs.Message: Approval required to delete CloudFormation stack: {{StackNameOrId}}
